title: Schapiro: Young Gun Cantor's new role: wise man
content:
Eric Cantor, the first casualty of the House Republican leadership wars, says that the lessons of the second casualty are lost on those who took out both: the GOP’s far right. 
  
In an op-ed article Sunday in The New York Times on John Boehner’s surprise decision to quit rather than risk his speakership in a quarrel with conservatives over a threatened government shutdown, the former House majority leader wrote, “Somewhere along the line, a number of voices on the right began demanding that the Republican Congress not only block (President Barack) Obama’s agenda but enact a reversal of his policies.
